import React, { Fragment, useState, useContext } from "react"; import { OrderContext } from "./index"; import UpdateOrderModal from "./UpdateOrderModal"; import SearchFilter from "./SearchFilter"; import { filterOrder } from "./Actions"; const OrderMenu = (props) => { const { data, dispatch } = useContext(OrderContext); const [dropdown, setDropdown] = useState(false); return (
{/* It's open the add order modal */}
setDropdown(!dropdown)} className="flex items-center cursor-pointer rounded-full overflow-hidden p-2 justify-center" > TÙY CHỌN
filterOrder("All", data, dispatch, dropdown, setDropdown) } className="px-4 py-2 hover:bg-black text-center cursor-pointer" > Tất cả filterOrder( "Not processed", data, dispatch, dropdown, setDropdown ) } className="px-4 py-2 hover:bg-black text-center cursor-pointer" > Không được xử lý filterOrder( "Processing", data, dispatch, dropdown, setDropdown ) } className="px-4 py-2 hover:bg-black text-center cursor-pointer" > Đang xử lý filterOrder("Shipped", data, dispatch, dropdown, setDropdown) } className="px-4 py-2 hover:bg-black text-center cursor-pointer" > Đang giao filterOrder( "Delivered", data, dispatch, dropdown, setDropdown ) } className="px-4 py-2 hover:bg-black text-center cursor-pointer" > Đã giao hàng filterOrder( "Cancelled", data, dispatch, dropdown, setDropdown ) } className="px-4 py-2 hover:bg-black text-center cursor-pointer" > Đã hủy
{/**/}
); }; export default OrderMenu;
